item.title: Asyncio in Python: A Deep Dive into Asynchronous I/O
item.author: Han
item.description: For the past few months, I’ve been working on an exciting internal project at my company: taking users’ documents and running them through LLM APIs to translate and summarize their content, somewhat similar to DeepL . The output is a collection of translated documents, each overlaid with the newly translated text. Our goal is to provide a stable service that can handle large files efficiently for thousands of employees at Samsungâ€”no small task! To achieve this, we needed a concurrency strategy that supports high throughput while remaining responsive. That’s where Asyncio comes in.
